articles.title: Foreign Ministry Spokesman Warns U.S. and Its Followers against Sea Blockade on DPRK
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry Spokesman Warns U.S. and Its Followers against Sea Blockade on DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA on Thursday as regards the fact that the U.S. is now talking about a naval blockade against the DPRK:
					 The gang of Trump, being terrified by our accomplishment of the great historic cause of completing the state nuclear force, is driving the situation on the Korean peninsula more and more close to the brink of war, acting recklessly without any sense of reason.
					
					 Recently, speaking at a gathering in Florida, Trump cried out for the harshest sanctions on our country. Soon after his remarks, Haley, U.S. permanent representative to the UN who is scorned by the world as an evil woman, dared to wag her tongue about further tightening the sanctions against north Korea and utterly destroying it without realizing the meaning of words coming out of her mouth.
					
					 Besides, high-ranking officials of the U.S. administration like Tillerson, U.S. secretary of State, and McMaster, national security advisor at the White House, are crying out for sea blockade against our country.
					
					 The U.S. is trying to arrange a ministerial-level meeting at the United Nations Security Council on the 15th to cook up another extremely harsh "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK such as enforcing the naval blockade under the excuse of "non-proliferation".
					
					 The naval blockade the gang of Trump is trying to pursue is something that was already tried and ended in vain during the collective sanctions campaign against us undertaken by the Bush administration under the signboard of "Proliferation Security Initiative" in the early 2000s.
					
					 A naval blockade is an act of wanton violation of the sovereignty and dignity of an independent state and an act of war of aggression which cannot be tolerated. 
					
					 The gang of Trump is taking extremely dangerous and big step towards the nuclear war by recklessly seeking the naval blockade against our country, neglecting the strategic prestige of our country that has achieved the great historic cause of completing the state nuclear force.
					
					 Should the U.S. and its followers try to enforce the naval blockade against our country, we will see it as an act of war and respond with merciless self-defensive counter-measures as we have warned repeatedly.
					
					 The international society should increase its vigilance on the reckless moves of the U.S. trying to ignite a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula, and if the UNSC does not wish to see the Korean peninsula and the whole world plunging into a nuclear war, it should act properly in accordance with its original mission which is to preserve peace and security of the world.

articles.title: Press Statement of DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesperson
articles.content:
Press Statement of DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesperson
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson of the DPRK Foreign Ministry issued a press statement on Thursday, which said:
					 Japan, holding the presidency of the United Nations Security Council (UNSC) during December this year and instigated by the United States, is now trying to make an evil use of its opportunity to convene a ministerial-level meeting of UNSC on "non-proliferation" issue of the DPRK.
					
					 The said meeting is none other than a desperate measure plotted by the U.S. being terrified by the incredible might of our Republic that has successfully achieved the great historic cause of completing the state nuclear force, the cause of building a rocket power, through the "great November event".
					
					 If "non-proliferation" issue is to be discussed, the first countries to be brought before the court of justice are the U.S. who is the kingpin of vertical and horizontal proliferation, pouring astronomical amount of funds into the modernization of nuclear weapons and hindering in every way the denuclearization of the Middle East, and Japan who keeps more than necessary stockpile of plutonium and seeks every opportunity to produce nuclear weapons.
					
					 Our possession of nuclear weapons was an inevitable self-defensive measure to defend our sovereignty and rights to existence and development from the U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail and if anyone is to blame for it, the U.S. is the very one who must be held accountable.
					
					 It is also disturbing to see the UN acting like a puppet of the U.S. and dancing to its tunes instead of keeping impartiality as the lifeline in its activities, true to its mission to preserve international peace and security.
					
					 It is UN of today that, while ignoring our repeated complaints to take up the issue of the provocative and aggressive joint military exercises, the most graphic manifestation of nuclear threat and blackmail of the U.S., keeps itself busy kowtowing to the U.S. that asserts sanctions and pressure against us by condemning our self-defensive measures.
					
					 As we have clarified in the government statement, the development and advancement of the strategic weapon of the DPRK are entirely to defend the sovereignty and territorial integrity of the country from the U.S. imperialists' nuclear blackmail policy and nuclear threat and to ensure the peaceful life of the people and therefore, they would not pose any threat to any country and region as long as the interests of the DPRK are not infringed upon.
					
					 The DPRK, as a responsible nuclear power and a peace-loving state, will sincerely fulfill its non-proliferation obligation assumed before the international society and put in every effort to achieve the noble cause of safeguarding world peace and stability.

articles.title: 5th Conference of Chairpersons of Cells of WPK to Be Held
articles.content:
5th Conference of Chairpersons of Cells of WPK to Be Held
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The 5th Conference of chairpersons of cells of the Workers' Party of Korea is to be held here in late December.
					 The conference will analyze and review successes and experience gained in the work of the Party cells during five years and discuss in detail the tasks and methods for successfully fulfilling their mission and duty in the campaign for implementing decisions of the 7th Congress of the WPK.

articles.title: Oath-taking Meeting of Participants in 8th Conference of Munitions Industry
articles.content:
Oath-taking Meeting of Participants in 8th Conference of Munitions Industry
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 8th Conference of Munitions Industry met at the April 25 House of Culture on Wednesday to adopt a letter of pledge to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 The letter of pledge to Kim Jong Un was read out at the meeting.
					
					 The letter said that the conclusion, made by Kim Jong Un at the conference, serves as important guidelines as it proudly reviewed the course covered by the Juche-based national defense industry under the guidance of the great leaders and the great Party and indicated a clear orientation and concrete ways for rapidly developing the country's defense industry into an ultra-modern self-reliant defense industry in the 21st century on the basis of the victory of significance in the history of the nation whereby the cause of completing the state nuclear force has been realized.
					
					 Noting that the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has become the strongest military power by possessing H-bomb, ICBM and SLBM in such short period of time despite the worst tempest and ordeals, it stressed that this great miracle in the history of the nation is the great victory won thanks to the idea of independence, matchless pluck and distinguished guidance of the respected Supreme Leader.
					
					 The letter went on:
					
					 We will advance with redoubled courage and high spirit toward the campaign for uninterrupted progress and innovations, enshrining the noble mission for the times and people.
					
					 We will become standard-bearers and shock brigade opening the wide avenue of the glorious Juche revolution with powerful arms, always remembering that the speed of national defense industry is the speed of the revolution.
					
					 National defense scientists and technicians will bravely advance in the spirit of death-defying corps for the country and the people gained in bolstering the nuclear force and further strengthen the state nuclear force in quality and quantity.
					
					 We will enhance the Juche character of national defense industry and realize its self-supporting capability, holding aloft the banner of self-reliance to smash the sanctions and pressure by the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces with world-startling miracles of the arsenal of the Supreme Command.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Thae Jong Su, No Kwang Chol, Hong Sung Mu, Hong Yong Chil and all the participants in the 8th Conference of Munitions Industry.

articles.title: Performance Given for Participants in 8th Conference of Munitions Industry
articles.content:
Performance Given for Participants in 8th Conference of Munitions Industry
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory performance was given here on Wednesday for the participants in the 8th Conference of Munitions Industry.
					 Among the audience were the participants in the conference including contributors to the successful test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-15 and scientists, technicians, workers and officials in the fields of national defense science and munitions industry and the relevant units.
					
					 Artistes of the State Merited Chorus and the Moranbong Band put on the stage songs of victory in simultaneously developing the two fronts.
					
					 The repertoire included song "The Glorious Motherland", light music and serial songs "We Are Victors," male chorus "DPRK Advances under the Red Flag" and female chorus and male chorus "Song of Hwasong Rocket".
					
					 Staged were also immortal masterpiece "Green Pine on Nam Hill" and "We Started from Scratch".
					
					 The performance was highly acclaimed by the audience.

articles.title: Contributors to Hwasong-15 Test-fire Visit Mangyongdae Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
Contributors to Hwasong-15 Test-fire Visit Mangyongdae Revolutionary Site
Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Contributors to the successful test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-15 Wednesday visited the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Site.
					 The scientists, technicians, workers and officials in the field of national defense science went round the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum. 
					
					 They watched historic relics and materials preserved there.
					
					 They looked round the mementoes in the historic old home, birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, being briefed on the history of the patriotic and revolutionary family members in Mangyongdae.

articles.title: Contributors to Hwasong-15 Test-fire Leave Pyongyang amid Warm Send-off
articles.content:
Contributors to Hwasong-15 Test-fire Leave Pyongyang amid Warm Send-off
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Scientists, technicians, workers and officials in the field of defense science Thursday left here after spending a meaningful time.
					 Those contributors to the successful test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-15 were given a send-off at the April 25 Hotel by Thae Jong Su, Hong Sung Mu and Hong Yong Chil and leading officials in the field of the defense industry.
					
					 Working citizens and youth and students of the city warmly saw them off along streets.

articles.title: Political Researcher on Essence of DPRK-U.S. Confrontation
articles.content:
Political Researcher on Essence of DPRK-U.S. Confrontation
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- O Ryong Chol, a researcher of the World Politics Study Center of the DPRK Institute for International Studies, released a commentary titled "Essence of DPRK-U.S. Confrontation Should Be Looked Squarely" on Thursday.
					 The essence of the present situation on the Korean peninsula and the DPRK-U.S. confrontation has been seriously distorted due to the U.S. false propaganda against the DPRK and its followers' rhetoric about cooperation, the commentary noted.
					
					 The DPRK-U.S. confrontation is the one between the U.S. resorting to the extreme hostile policy and nuclear threat and blackmail for more than half a century and the DPRK striving hard to defend the sovereignty and rights to existence and development, it said, and went on:
					
					 Any literate man is quite well aware that the U.S. hostile policy and nuclear threat and blackmail forced the DPRK to the access to nuclear weapons and completion of a nuclear force.
					
					 However, the U.S. is pushing the DPRK-U.S. confrontation to that between the DPRK and the international community. Lurking behind this is a sinister intention to instill fear of nuclear weapons and term the DPRK's nuclear possession for self-defence as "an evil act" and thus deny the historical circumstances around the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons and its legitimacy and "demonize" the DPRK and thus isolate and stifle it.
					
					 Pro-American allies staking their fate on pursuance of the U.S., big countries seeking to promote their national interests and maintain the order-led by them through cooperation with the U.S., and some countries who mistake the pursuance of the U.S. as a global trend have irresponsibly chimed in with it. This has created a false feeling that the confrontation between the DPRK and the U.S. is the one between the DPRK and the international community.
					
					 Denial of the essence and attachment to false picture would not help evade catastrophic consequences and only belated regret will entail.
					
					 Those allies of the U.S. would be well advised to seriously ponder over what they can get and what they can lose from their pursuance of the U.S.
					
					 If they poke their nose in the DPRK-U.S. confrontation while touting "obligation as allies" even though they are not properly reading the essence of the situation on the Korean peninsula, they can never evade the same fate as that was met by Mussolini and Tojo who pursued fascist dictatorial lunatic Hitler in the past century. They should clearly remember this, though belatedly.
					
					 Big powers around the DPRK should see through the scheme of the falling "only superpower" and behave with discretion.
					
					 If they are big powers having influence on the world politics with responsibility, they should clearly face up to the situation in which the times when the U.S. used to threaten the DPRK with nukes have gone never to return and the war is being deterred on the Korean peninsula thanks to the nuclear weapons of the DPRK, and look for solution for settling the present situation.
					
					 Time has come for those countries taking advantage of the U.S. line without principle to come to their senses.
					
					 They should clearly understand that the U.S. struggle to convert the DPRK-U.S. confrontation into that between the DPRK and the international community is mainly aimed to inveigle other countries in the fight devoid of chance of victory and use them as cheap cannon fodder.
					
					 Things, called for by the "superpower" and supported by its followers, do not always become trend and any "resolution" of the UN Security Council adopted under the pressure of the "superpower" does never represent the "will of the international community".
					
					 The DPRK-U.S. confrontation can never come to an end unless the U.S. hostile policy and nuclear threat to the DPRK, its source, is terminated. 
					
					 Squarely facing up to such essence of the DPRK-U.S. confrontation that has lasted century after century and behaving on a fair ground would be a proper way of defending justice and peace.
					
					 As was solemnly clarified in the DPRK government's statement, the DPRK's development of strategic weapons and their advancement are entirely to defend the sovereignty and territorial integrity of the country from the U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail policy and to safeguard the peaceful life of its people, and therefore, they do not pose threat to any country or region unless they infringe upon the state interests of the DPRK.
					
					 Therefore, any country, if it truly wants global peace and security, should clearly discern the present situation on the Korean peninsula and the trend of the times and exercise its influence and pressure on the U.S. so that it gives up the hostile policy toward the DPRK and nuclear threat and blackmail against it, before it becomes too late.

articles.title: Russian Defense Ministry Delegation Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Russian Defense Ministry Delegation Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Defense Ministry of Russia led by Victor Kalganov, vice-director of the National Defense Command Center of the Russian Federation, Thursday visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay homage to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The members of the delegation paid tribute to the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il at the palace.
					
					 They paid homage to the great leaders at the halls of immortality where they lie in state.
					
					 The visitors went round the halls where the orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Oath-taking Meetings by Working People's Organizations
articles.content:
Oath-taking Meetings by Working People's Organizations
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Working people's organizations held meetings Thursday to observe the 6th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present at the meetings were Vice-Chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Choe Hwi, officials concerned and officials and members of the trade union, agricultural workers' union and women's union.
					
					 Reports were made to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporters and speakers said the life of Kim Jong Il was the most brilliant one of a peerlessly great man who saved the destiny of the country and the nation and provided an eternal foundation for building a thriving country.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un is adding luster to the revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il, they added.
					
					 They called on the people to dedicate themselves to the patriotic struggle for carrying out the great leaders' cause of building a prosperous country, true to the guidance of the Supreme Leader.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Members of missions of UNDP, UNICEF, United Nations Population Fund, FAO, WFP and WHO here visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Thursday on the occasion of the sixth anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.
					 They laid floral baskets before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: December 15 Quality Medal Awarded
articles.content:
December 15 Quality Medal Awarded
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The December 15 Quality Medal has been awarded to best domestic products in the DPRK from Juche 103 (2014).
					 The medal was instituted according to the instruction of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un for increasing the quality in production and construction.
					
					 Recently, it was awarded to different products.
					
					 Among them are bags made by the Pyongyang Bag Factory, active electrode boiler by North Hwanghae Provincial High-tech Product Manufactory and fried-rice cake by the Mangyongdae Kyonghung Foodstuff Factory.
					
					 In particular, the active electrode boiler is an energy-saving one, which is five times smaller than the existing ones of same capacity in volume and needs 30-40 percent less power with high heating efficiency as it can be installed near production sites. And 85 percent of its accessories are made by the manufactory.

articles.title: "Sinjungdonggukyojisungnam", Geographical Heritage of Korean Nation
articles.content:
"Sinjungdonggukyojisungnam", Geographical Heritage of Korean Nation
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- "Sinjungdonggukyojisungnam" in 55 volumes complied in 1530 is the revised edition of "Tonggukyojisungnam (Korean geography)", which deals with geographical features of 330 regions of Korea.
					 "Tonggukyojisungnam" was got up by Ro Sa Sin, Ryang Song Ji and other personages in 1481, but later, was revised by Ri Haeng, Hong On Phil and others.
					
					 While compiling "Sinjungdonggukyojisungnam", its editors put a mark of "Sinjung (identified)" on newly supplemented data with corresponding comments in order to distinguish them from the original contents of "Tonggukyojisungnam".
					
					 Vols. 1 and 2 deal with topographical features of Kyongdo (the capital of the country), vol. 3 Hansongbu, vols. 4 and 5 Kaesongbu, vols. 6-13 Kyonggi Province, vols. 14-20 Chungchong Province, vols. 21-32 Kyongsang Province, vols. 33 and 40 Jolla Province, vols. 41-43 Hwanghae Province, vols. 44-47 Kangwon Province, vols. 48-50 Hamgyong Province and vols. 51-55 Phyongan Province.
					
					 "Sinjungdonggukyojisungnam", a comprehensive collection of geographical study achievements made in Korea, is one of precious geographical heritages of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Minju Joson Warns S. Korean Warmongers against Anti-North Scenarios
articles.content:
Minju Joson Warns S. Korean Warmongers against Anti-North Scenarios 
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet warmongers have lately organized a "special mission brigade" for the "decapitation operation" in contingency and an "air intelligence corps" for "precision monitoring of key military facilities of the DPRK.
					 They are now getting frantic with the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north, making a heavy outlay of funds for the units in the wake of formation of the units specializing in terrorism and monitoring.
					
					 In this regard Minju Joson Thursday in a commentary says it means an extremely dangerous scenario to start a nuclear war against the north under the pretext of "detecting signs of nuclear and missile provocations".
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities are committing unpardonable treason, crying for "eradicating the north's war headquarters" through the organization of such professional killers' forces, which could hardly be found during the former conservative regime keen on the confrontation with the DPRK, the commentary says, adding:
					
					 Whoever impairs the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership is bound to get merciless punishment.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will wipe out such provocateurs to the last man, once their slight sign of movement has been detected.
					
					 If the south Korean puppet warmongers persist in the military confrontation, crying out for "decapitation operation" despite our stern warning, they will be held entirely accountable for the horrible consequences to be entailed by such action.

articles.title: Minju Joson Snipes at U.S. Project of Sea Blockade against DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Snipes at U.S. Project of Sea Blockade against DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The chief executive and other heavyweights of the U.S. administration are recently crying out for imposing sea blockade upon the DPRK in their public appearances.
					 They seek to secure a legal justification for the blockade by modifying the phrases of the "sanctions resolution" cooked up at the UN, while pressurizing its major allies to collect information about the movements of DPRK-flagged ships by mobilizing sea-patrol planes.
					
					 Commenting on the facts, Minju Joson Thursday says:
					
					 The scenario of the U.S. administration is just a reckless one of those ignorant of what the sea blockade means and what consequences it will cause.
					
					 Sea blockade is just a wanton violation of the sovereignty and vital rights of the DPRK and maximum pressure on it.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that the situation on the Korean peninsula will plunge into an uncontrollable catastrophe once sea blockade is imposed on the DPRK.
					
					 The situation clearly proves that the U.S. is just entirely accountable for worsening the situation on the Korean peninsula and wrecking global peace and security, and that the Trump cult's sanctions racket to stifle the DPRK is just a thrice-cursed crime which deserves worldwide criticism.
					
					 If the Trump group shows any slightest sign of putting the blockade project into practice, the invincible revolutionary forces of the DPRK which show no mercy for the aggressors will take immediate and merciless countermeasure for self-defence.
					
					 Frankly speaking, the group has put the U.S. mainland as a whole closer in sight of the DPRK's nuclear retaliatory strike, through its scheme for sea blockade.
					
					 This goes to prove that Trump will be the worst president who destroys the destiny of the U.S.

articles.title: U.S. Fate Is in Hand of DPRK: Minju Joson
articles.content:
U.S. Fate Is in Hand of DPRK: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has kept a firm hand on the U.S. fate and the latter's nuclear blackmail and threat against the former will no longer work and on the contrary the Americans cannot help fearing presence of the DPRK, - an inevitable fruit born from the Trump group's ignorance of its rival, Minju Joson Thursday says in a commentary.
					 Whether the U.S. likes or not and wants or not, the status of the standoff between the DPRK and U.S. has come under the control of the faith and will of the DPRK which is holding the initiative, the commentary says, adding:
					
					 Not yet waken from a sleep, the Trump group is attempting to seek a way out by pursuing a policy of military confrontation but this is nothing but a death-bed struggle by those alarmed by the might of the DPRK always emerging victorious.
					
					 After meeting the great event to be specially recorded in the history of the Korean nation, the army and people of the DPRK are full of iron faith and will that the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un means precisely the guarantee of victory and glory and nothing is impossible and fearful when they remain loyal to his idea and leadership.
					
					 If the U.S. attempts to annoy the valorous spirit of the Juche Korea dashing toward a thumping victory through sanctions and military confrontation moves, it will get nowhere.
					
					 It is worth recalling once again that the best measure for the U.S. is to become prudent and think twice and, though belatedly, it had better pull itself together as it had already ate crow in a reckless military standoff.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Slashes Japan for Fanning up War Crisis
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Slashes Japan for Fanning up War Crisis
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Herald Economy on Dec. 9 carried an article denouncing the Japanese reactionaries' moves to secure the ability to carry out preemptive attack by intentionally fanning up the war crisis.
					 The article charged that the Japanese government is enforcing the acceleration of the introduction of various kinds of missiles, despite the objection from the opposition forces and organizations, allegedly to cope with the "nuclear and missile threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 It revealed that Japan included the introduction of various kinds of missiles such as long-range air-to-surface missiles in the 2018 budget.
					
					 It pointed out that Japan fanned up war crisis by carrying out the drill simulating the "north's armed attack" for the first time in several regions last month and has planned to conduct an evacuation drill of citizens early next year.

articles.title: Resignation of Corrupt Officials Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Resignation of Corrupt Officials Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The Joint Council of Civic and Public Organizations in North Chungchong Province and the Chungbuk branch of the KBS headquarters of the Media Trade Union of south Korea reportedly held a press conference on Dec. 11 to urge the immediate resignation of the managing director of the KBS council and the president of the KBS.
					 The speakers said that the public broadcasting can't be normalized with the KBS council involving the criminals who destroyed the public broadcasting left intact.
					
					 The trade union of the KBS has been on a general strike for more than 100 days since last September, in demand of the resignation of the managing director and directors of the council and the president of the KBS.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia brought out in booklet respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" on Dec. 4 to commemorate the 6th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies that it is the principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of the Korean revolution to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).  It indicates the tasks for steadily strengthening the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Libya
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Libya
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- A Libyan committee for remembering Comrade Kim Jong Il was formed by the Sunbula International Friendship Club on December 10.
					 The chairman of the Libya-DPRK Friendship Association was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and immortal exploits of leader Kim Jong Il on the anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- Events took place in Bulgaria, Switzerland, India, Pakistan and Germany between Nov. 14 and Dec. 7 to commemorate the sixth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 A seminar on Kim Jong Il's work "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable" was held by the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism. Speakers there stressed that he is the distinguished thinker-theoretician and prominent leader as he proved the scientific accuracy and truth of socialism and inevitability of its victory to baffle the absurd sophism of the imperialists and reactionaries.
					
					 The chief of the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and other speakers at a seminar on respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" expressed the belief that the DPRK would become a thriving socialist power, noting that the work enriched the ideo-theoretical treasure-house of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The chairman of the Juche Idea Study Society of Indian Delhi said that Kim Jong Il, eternal leader of the Workers' Party of Korea, is the great master of independent politics who performed huge exploits for the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Pakistani Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea lauded the exploits of Kim Jong Il who had steadily advanced the revolutionary cause of Juche, the cause of Songun revolution by creditably carrying forward the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Speakers at a seminar held by the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany said the DPRK at present is unthinkable without the august name of Kim Jong Il, adding that it has been turned into a politico-ideological power, military power and nuclear weapons state thanks to his devotion and efforts.

articles.title: U.S. Hostile Policy towards DPRK Denounced by Regional Body
articles.content:
U.S. Hostile Policy towards DPRK Denounced by Regional Body
 Pyongyang, December 14 (KCNA) -- The Latin American and Caribbean Regional Committee to Support the Reunification of Korea issued a statement on Nov. 30 in denunciation of the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					 Noting that the DPRK has been exposed to consistent threat of aggression from the U.S. since its foundation, the statement said:
					
					 The U.S. is talking about the "issue of human rights" in the DPRK.
					
					 It re-listed socialist Korea as a "state sponsor of terrorism" with a sinister aim to completely destroy it.
					
					 It is daily escalating tensions on the Korean peninsula with its anti-DPRK war drills while keeping its forces of aggression in south Korea on a permanent basis.
					
					 The DPRK is a country which thoroughly guarantees genuine freedom and rights of the people.
					
					 The U.S. should revoke unreasonable resolutions it cooked up by taking issue with "human rights performance" in the DPRK.
					
					 It should immediately withdraw the re-listing of the DPRK as a "state sponsor of terrorism" and lift the brutal sanctions and economic blockade against it and accept the DPRK's proposal for replacing the Armistice Agreement with a peace accord and stop creating obstacles in the way of Korea's reunification.
					
					 The statement stressed that the United Nations should stop following the U.S. blindly and respect the Korean people's sovereignty and right to self-determination and fulfill its mission for the reunification of the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Vocero de cancilleria coreana advierte a EE.UU. y sus fuerzas seguidoras
articles.content:
Vocero de cancilleria coreana advierte a EE.UU. y sus fuerzas seguidoras
Pyongyang, 14 de diciembre (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la ACNC formulada en relacion con que en estos ultimos dias EE.UU. habla ruidosamente del bloqueo maritimo contra la RPDC, el vocero del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio hoy la siguiente respuesta:
					Los compinches de Trump, tan pasmados ante el logro de la gran causa historica del perfeccionamiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC, llevan mas y mas la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana al umbral de guerra.
					
					En un mitin sostenido recientemente en Florida, Trump insistio en la sancion durisima contra la RPDC. Y Haley, representante norteamericana ante la ONU, reconocida como malvada sin parragon en el mundo, lanza sin titubeo las palabras absurdas tales como hay que recrudecer mas la sancion contra el Norte de Corea y se destruira completamente.
					
					Tambien, el secretario de Estado norteamericano Tillerson, el asistente de seguridad nacional de la Casa Blanca McMaster y otras figuras de alto rango de la administracion norteamericana tambien hablan a porfia del bloqueo maritimo contra la RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. trata de convocar el dia 15 la reunion ministerial del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU para inventar la extremada "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC sobre el bloqueo naval  bajo el pretexto de la "no proliferacion".
					
					El bloqueo maritimo que intentan los compinches de Trump es una obra fracasada de la administracion Bush que a principios de la decada de 2000 trato de atentar a la RPDC mediante la campana colectiva de sancion y bloqueo preconizada bajo el vistoso rotulo de la "iniciativa de seguridad contra la proliferacion".
					
					Esta maniobra deviene una violacion violenta a la soberania y la dignidad de un Estado soberano y ademas constituye un intolerable acto de guerra agresiva.
					
					Ignorada de la posicion estrategica de la RPDC que llevo a feliz termino la gran causa historica del perfeccionamiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado, la horda de Trump dio un gran paso peligroso hacia la provocacion de la guerra nuclear persiguiendo el bloqueo naval contra nuestro pais.
					
					Si EE.UU. y sus fuerzas hostiles intentan perpetrar el bloqueo maritimo contra la RPDC, lo consideraremos como el acto de guerra y le responderemos con las despiadadas contramedidas autodefensivas, como ya hemos advertido en reiteradas veces.
					
					La sociedad internacional debe elevar la vigilancia ante la imprudencia de EE.UU. desesperado por desatar la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana. Si el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU no desea que la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo se caigan en el torbellino de guerra nuclear, debera actuar razonablemente adhiriendose a su mision original de garantizar la paz y seguridad del mundo.

articles.title: RPDC sera fiel a su deber de no proliferacion de armas nucleares, subraya vocero de cancilleria coreana
articles.content:
RPDC sera fiel a su deber de no proliferacion de armas nucleares, subraya vocero de cancilleria coreana
Pyongyang, 14 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Estos dias, Japon, instigado por EE.UU., trata de convocar una reunion ministerial en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU con el tema de "no proliferacion" de la RPDC abusando la oportunidad de haber ocupado la presidencia de diciembre de este aparato internacional.
					Esta farsa no es mas que un ardid barato de EE.UU., tan espantado ante el inagotable poderio de la RPDC que a traves del "gran evento de noviembre" llevo a feliz termino la gran causa historica del perfeccionamiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares, la de conversion del pais en la potencia coheteril.
					
					Senala asi el vocero del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC en su nota fechada hoy, y prosigue:
					
					Si necesitan discutir el tema de "no proliferacion", deben sentarse antes que otros en el banquillo de acusados EE.UU, caudillo de la proliferacion vertical y horizontal, que invierte los fondos astronomicos en la modernizacion de armas nucleares y obstaculiza por todos los medios la desnuclearizacion del Medio Oriente y Japon que asecha la oportunidad de fabricar en cualquier momento las armas nucleares depositando una cantidad excesiva de plutonios.
					
					La fabricacion de armas nucleares de la RPDC constituye una inevitable medida autodefensiva tomada para defender la soberania y los derechos a la existencia y el desarrollo desde la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. Por esta razon, EE.UU. debe ser el primer objeto a que deben inquirir la responsabilidad.
					
					Tambien, necesita cuestionar al hecho de que la ONU, que tiene la mision de garantizar la paz y la seguridad internacional y presenta como su vida la imparcialidad en sus actividades, baila al son que le toca el pais norteamericano al convertirse en su marioneta.
					
					Esa organizacion internacional cuestiona las medidas de la RPDC por su defensa legitima dando vista gorda a sus reiteradas apelaciones contra los provocativos y agresivos entrenamientos militares conjuntos que se sirven de la expresion mas concreta de la amenaza y chantaje nuclear de EE.UU., y se congracia con toda pasion y celo con este pais americano que se obstina en la sancion y presion.
					
					Como fue aclarado en la declaracion del gobierno de la RPDC, la fabricacion y desarrollo de armas estrategicas de nuestro pais son en absoluto para defender la soberania y la integridad territorial del pais y la vida pacifica del pueblo desde la politica de chantaje nuclear y la amenaza nuclear del imperialismo norteamericano. Por tanto, esos medios no serviran de amenaza para ningun pais o region mientras estos no perjudiquen los intereses de la RPDC.
					
					Siendo la potencia nuclear responsable y Estado amante de la paz, la RPDC cumplira con sinceridad su deber de no proliferacion asumido ante la sociedad internacional y hara todos sus esfuerzos por lograr el noble objeto de defender la paz y la estabilidad del mundo.

articles.title: Se convocara V Conferencia de los Presidentes de Celulas del PTC
articles.content:
Se convocara V Conferencia de los Presidentes de Celulas del PTC
Pyongyang, 14 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Se convocara en la segunda quincena de diciembre en esta capital la V Conferencia de los Presidentes de las Celulas del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					El conclave analizara y balanceara los exitos y experiencias logrados en el ultimo lustro en los trabajos de las celulas del partido y discutira las tareas y remedios concretos para hacerles cumplir plenamente su mision y deber en la lucha por implementar la resolucion del VII Congreso del PTC.

articles.title: Participantes en la Conferencia de Industria Armamentista deciden jugar papel de vanguardia
articles.content:
Participantes en la Conferencia de Industria Armamentista deciden jugar papel de vanguardia
Pyongyang, 14 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 13 en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto de aprobacion de la nota de juramento de los participantes en la 8a Conferencia de Industria Armamentista que se dirige al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					En la ocasion se dio lectura al juramento.
					
					El discurso resumen de Kim Jong Un pronunciado en la conferencia hizo balance de la orgullosa trayectoria que recorrio la autoctona industria de defensa nacional bajo la guia del gran Lider y el gran Partido, comenzo el texto y prosiguio:
					
					A base de la victoria historica nacional con que se cumplio la causa de completar las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado, esa orientacion programatica indico en claro el rumbo y los remedios concretos para desarrollar vertiginosamente la industria de defensa nacional de nuestro Estado como la independiente y sofisticada del siglo 21.
					
					El gran milagro nacional, o sea, la conversion de nuestra patria en un periodo tan corto en la mejor potencia militar dispuesta de la bomba H, el ICBM y el SLBM a pesar de las pruebas y dificultades mas duras es una gran victoria de la idea sobre la independencia del Maximo Dirigente, su audacia incomparable y orientacion extraordinaria.
					
					Nosotros, los participantes en la conferencia, tomaremos con coraje redoblado la posicion de ataque continuo por la victoria final teniendo siempre presente nuestra noble mision asumida ante la epoca y el pueblo.
					
					Sin olvidar ni un momento que la velocidad de avance de la industria armamentista es la de la marcha de la revolucion, seremos abanderados y brigadas de choque que abran con fusiles invencibles el ancho camino de la gloriosa revolucion del Juche.
					
					Los cientificos y tecnicos de la rama de defensa nacional seguiran consolidando en lo cualitativo y cuantitativo las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado al avanzar con valentia con el espiritu de peloton suicida por la patria y el pueblo, adquirido en el curso de incremento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					Bajo la bandera de autoconfianza, haremos mas independiente nuestra industria armamentista para frustrar asi la campana de sancion y presion del imperialismo yanqui y las fuerzas seguidoras mediante el pleno funcionamiento del arsenal de la Comandancia Suprema.
					
					Tomaron parte en la ocasion Thae Jong Su, No Kwang Chol, Hong Sung Mu, Hong Yong Chil, asi como los participantes en dicho conclave.

articles.title: Ofrecida la funcion artistica para felicitar a los participantes en conferencia
articles.content:
Ofrecida la funcion artistica para felicitar a los participantes en conferencia
Pyongyang, 14 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar la vispera en esta capital la funcion artistica en honor de los participantes en la 8a Conferencia de Industria Armamentista.
					Lo disfrutaron los participantes en el presente conclave incluyendo los contribuyentes al exitoso lanzamiento de prueba de ICBM "Hwasong-15" y los cientificos, tecnicos, trabajadores y funcionarios de la rama de investigacion de ciencia de defensa nacional, la de industria armamentista y de las unidades concernientes.
					
					Los artistas del Coro Estatal Benemerito y la Banda Moranbong crearon y describieron la cancion a la victoria de la linea de desarrollo paralelo del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					Ellos cantaron en tono patetico el aspecto majestuoso de la gran potencia, en sus piezas tales como la cancion "Patria radiante", la musica ligera y las canciones en serie "Somos triunfadores", el coro masculino "Corea avanza con la bandera roja en alto", el solo y coro masculinos "!Adelante, Corea, siguiendo la linea de desarrollo paralelo!" y el solo femenino y el coro masculino "Cancion de Canon Hwasong", etc.
					
					Se pusieron en la escena la obra maestra "Pino verde en el monte Nam", "Hemos comenzado de la nada", el coro masculino "Somos clase obrera de la industria armamentista", el solo masculino "Confesion" y el coro femenino "Gloria de la vida".
					
					La funcion arranco la efusiva ovacion de los espectadores.

articles.title: Investigador coreano revela la esencia de confrontacion RPDC-EE.UU.
articles.content:
Investigador coreano revela la esencia de confrontacion RPDC-EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 14 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El investigador del Centro de Estudio de la Politica Mundial del Instituto de Asuntos Internacionales de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, O Ryong Chol, publico el dia 14 un comentario intitulado "Hay que conocer bien la esencia de la confrontacion RPDC-EE.UU."
					La situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y la esencia de la confrontacion entre la RPDC y EE.UU. son tergiversadas seriamente por las desinformaciones de EE.UU. y la complicidad de sus satelites, comenzo el autor y continuo:
					
					La confrontacion RPDC-EE.UU. perdura mas de medio siglo.
					
					La primera hace todo lo posible para defender la soberania nacional y los derechos a la subsistencia y al desarrollo frente a la politica de hostilidad y la amenaza y chantaje nucleares del segundo. 
					
					Cualquier sabio conoceria que la politica hostil y la amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU. empujaron a su rival socialista a optar por la tenencia de armas nucleares y completar sus fuerzas armadas nucleares. 
					
					Sin embargo, EE.UU. describe el enfrentamiento con la RPDC como la confrontacion entre ella y la sociedad internacional con el malsano intento de negar el proceso historico y la razon de la posesion de armas nucleares por parte de la segunda al infundir unilateralmente la inquietud por ese artefacto y calificar de "mal" la posesion del mismo con fines de autodefensa y al mismo tiempo, aislarla y aplastarla completamente estigmatizandola de "satanica". 
					
					Se suman con irresponsabilidad a la campana anti-RPDC los paises aliados de EE.UU., que consideran como fatal la dependencia del imperio americano, las potencias que tratan de facilitar los intereses estatales mediante la colaboracion con EE.UU. y mantener el orden centrado en si mismas, y algunos paises que creen erroneamente que el servilismo a EE.UU. es una tendencia de la epoca. De esta manera, se crea la imagen virtual como si la confrontacion entre la RPDC y EE.UU. fuera el enfrentamiento de la primera con la sociedad internacional. 
					
					La vision virtual proveniente de la ignorancia de la esencia causara la consecuencia catastrofica y el arrepentimiento tardio. 
					
					Ante todo, los paises aliados de EE.UU. deben pensar con seriedad en lo que podrian obtener o perder con el servilismo al imperio. 
					
					Si se meten en la confrontacion RPDC-EE.UU. hablando de la "obligacion de aliado" sin ver la esencia de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, no podran eludir el destino tragico que sufrieron Mussolini y Tojo por su obediencia ciega al dictador fascista Hitler en el siglo pasado. 
					
					Las potencias vecinas tambien deben actuar con responsabilidad calando a fondo las malas entranas de la "superpotencia" en decadencia.
					
					Si fuera potencia responsable e influyente en la politica internacional, debera buscar la solucion realista teniendo correcta vision sobre la situacion actual en que las armas nucleares de la RPDC impiden el estallido de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana y termino la era en que el imperio americano amenazaba con armas nucleares a su rival. 
					
					Ahora es el tiempo en que se vuelvan en si los paises obedientes a EE.UU. 
					
					Hay que darse cuenta de que EE.UU. trata de convertir la confrontacion con la RPDC en el enfrentamiento de esta con la sociedad internacional para utilizar a otros paises como carne de canon en esa pelea sin posibilidades de ganar. 
					
					No se hacen una tendencia de la epoca la insistencia de la "superpotencia" y el reforzamiento de sus satelites ni se considera como "voluntad unanime" de la sociedad internacional la "resolucion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU coaccionado por la "superpotencia". 
					
					La confrontacion RPDC-EE.UU. no se acabara mientras no desaparezcan la politica de hostilidad y la amenaza nuclear del segundo contra la primera. 
					
					Actuar con imparcialidad comprendiendo bien esta esencia de la larga confrontacion entre los dos paises constituye una justa medida para defender la justicia y la paz. 
					
					Como esta indicado en la declaracion del gobierno de la RPDC, el desarrollo de armas nucleares de nuestro pais es para defender la soberania nacional y la integridad territorial del pais desde la politica de chantaje nuclear de EE.UU. y asegurar la vida pacifica del pueblo y no significa amenaza para ningun pais o region mientras estos no infrinjan los intereses de nuestro Estado. 
					
					Cualquier pais que desea de veras la paz y la seguridad del mundo debe ver correctamente la nueva realidad de la Peninsula Coreana y la corriente de la epoca y ejercer la influencia y presion sobre EE.UU. para que no tarde mas en renunciar la politica de hostilidad y la amenaza y chantaje nucleares contra la RPDC.

articles.title: Tienen lugar actos de juramento de entidades de masas
articles.content:
Tienen lugar actos de juramento de entidades de masas
Pyongyang, 14 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 14 respectivamente los actos de juramento de las entidades de masas dedicados al 6o aniversario del fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					En las ocasiones estuvieron presentes Choe Hwi, vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, los funcionarios de ramas interesadas, la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea, la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea y la Union Socialista de Mujeres de Corea, los obreros, los miembros de la FGSC, los trabajadores agricolas y los integrantes de la UTAC y de la USMC.
					
					En respectivos actos hubo informes e intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores alabaron la vida del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como la mas brillante del gran hombre quien defendio el destino del pais y la nacion y asento la eterna base de la construccion de la patria prospera.
					
					Apuntaron que sus hazanas revolucionarias continuaran gracias al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					Exhortaron a quedar fieles a la direccion del Maximo Dirigente y dedicarse a la lucha patriotica por cumplir la causa de los grandes lideres sobre la construccion de la patria prospera.
